nodes.text: Mirana Fioro was a female Hapan con artist who lived during the early years of the Galactic Empire. Fioro specialized at performing scams while in disguise as a Hapan noblewoman and in about 17 BBY, she entered in the Cloud City Sabacc Tournament on the planet Bespin at the behest of the Hutt crime lord Darga Jiramma Mionne. Darga had made a deal with the Empire to supply resources for use on the Sarlacc Project and Fioro's task was to covertly received Darga's payment from Lieutenant Armen Arandis, an Imperial officer who was participating in the tournament.
